question: List all movies that have a backdrop path available.
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE m.backdrop_path IS NOT NULL
RETURN m.title
error: Schema mismatch: movie entity doesn't have backdrop_path attribute

question: What are the first 5 movies that have a genre change from their original genre in a collection?
error: Schema mismatch: collection doesn't have IN_GENRE relation

question: List the first 3 movies with a backdrop path that includes '/9FBwqcd9IRruEDUrTdcaafOMKUq.jpg'.
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE m.backdrop_path IS NOT NULL AND m.backdrop_path CONTAINS '/9FBwqcd9IRruEDUrTdcaafOMKUq.jpg'
RETURN m.title
LIMIT 3
error: Schema mismatch: movie entity doesn't have backdrop_path attribute

question: Which 3 videos have the most associated cast members?
cypher:
MATCH (v:Video)<-[:CAST_FOR]-(p:Person)
RETURN v.title AS video, count(p) AS cast_members
ORDER BY cast_members DESC
LIMIT 3
error: Schema mismatch: video doesn't play cast_for:film role (only movie does)

question: Name the top 5 movies that have been produced in more than 3 countries.
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)-[:PRODUCED_IN_COUNTRY]->(c:Country)
WITH m, count(c) AS countryCount
WHERE countryCount > 3
RETURN m.title
ORDER BY m.popularity DESC
LIMIT 5
error: TypeQL doesn't support HAVING clause (filter on aggregated count)

question: Name the first 5 movies that have been rated by at least 50 users.
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)<-[r:RATED]-(:User)
WITH m, count(r) AS num_ratings
WHERE num_ratings >= 50
RETURN m.title
ORDER BY num_ratings DESC
LIMIT 5
error: TypeQL doesn't support HAVING clause (filter on aggregated count)

question: Which movies have been produced in the 'United States of America' and have an adult rating?
error: Complex nested EXISTS pattern not supported in TypeQL

question: Which movies have a runtime longer than the average runtime of all movies?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WITH m, avg(m.runtime) AS avg_runtime
WHERE m.runtime > avg_runtime
RETURN m.title, m.runtime
ORDER BY m.runtime DESC
error: TypeQL doesn't support comparing to computed aggregate (subquery)

question: Which 3 production companies are associated with the most number of genres across movies, videos, and adult films?
cypher:
MATCH (c:ProductionCompany)-[:PRODUCED_BY]-(m)
WHERE m:Movie OR m:Video OR m:Adult
WITH c, count(distinct m) AS num_genres
RETURN c.name AS company, num_genres
ORDER BY num_genres DESC
LIMIT 3
error: TypeQL doesn't support multi-type union queries with aggregate

question: Which 3 people have acted in the most number of videos?
cypher:
MATCH (p:Person)-[:CAST_FOR]->(v:Video)
WITH p, count(v) AS videoCount
ORDER BY videoCount DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN p.name AS person, videoCount
error: Schema mismatch: video doesn't play cast_for:film role

question: Who are the first 3 actors by number of roles in videos with a status of 'Released'?
cypher:
MATCH (p:Person)-[:CAST_FOR]->(v:Video {status: 'Released'})
RETURN p.name AS actor, count(*) AS num_roles
ORDER BY num_roles DESC
LIMIT 3
error: Schema mismatch: video doesn't play cast_for:film role

question: Who are the first 3 actors to have starred in at least 3 movies from the 'Toy Story Collection'?
cypher:
MATCH (p:Person)-[:CAST_FOR]->(m:Movie)-[:IN_COLLECTION]->(c:Collection {name: 'Toy Story Collection'})
WITH p, count(m) AS num_movies
WHERE num_movies >= 3
RETURN p.name
ORDER BY num_movies DESC
LIMIT 3
error: TypeQL doesn't support HAVING clause (filter on aggregated count)

question: Who are the first 3 actors with the most roles in videos released after 2010?
cypher:
MATCH (p:Person)-[:CAST_FOR]->(v:Video)
WHERE v.release_date > date('2010-01-01')
WITH p, count(v) AS roles
ORDER BY roles DESC
LIMIT 3
RETURN p.name AS actor, roles
error: Schema mismatch: video doesn't play cast_for:film role

question: Who are the first 3 directors with movies in at least three different genres?
cypher:
MATCH (p:Person)-[:CREW_FOR {job: 'Director'}]->(m:Movie)
WITH p, count(distinct m.id) AS num_movies, collect(distinct m.id) AS movie_ids
WHERE num_movies >= 3
WITH p, num_movies, movie_ids
UNWIND movie_ids AS movie_id
MATCH (m:Movie {id: movie_id})-[:IN_GENRE]->(g:Genre)
WITH p, num_movies, collect(distinct g.name) AS genres
WHERE size(genres) >= 3
RETURN p.name AS director, num_movies, genres
ORDER BY num_movies DESC
LIMIT 3
error: TypeQL doesn't support HAVING clause (filter on aggregated count)

question: List the first 3 actors who have appeared in at least three movies with different original languages.
cypher:
MATCH (p:Person)-[:CAST_FOR]->(m:Movie)
WITH p, count(DISTINCT m.original_language) AS num_languages
WHERE num_languages >= 3
RETURN p.name
LIMIT 3
error: TypeQL doesn't support HAVING clause (filter on aggregated count)

question: List the top 3 actors who have appeared in both movies and videos.
cypher:
MATCH (p:Person)-[:CAST_FOR]->(m:Movie)
WITH p, count(m) AS numMovies
WHERE numMovies > 0
MATCH (p)-[:CAST_FOR]->(v:Video) 
WITH p, numMovies, count(v) AS numVideos
WHERE numVideos > 0
RETURN p.name AS actor, numMovies, numVideos
ORDER BY numMovies + numVideos DESC
LIMIT 3
error: Schema mismatch: video doesn't play cast_for:film role

question: List the top 5 movies with the most diverse cast, measured by the number of different countries actors come from.
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)<-[:CAST_FOR]-(p:Person)
WITH m, size(collect(distinct p.country)) AS num_countries
ORDER BY num_countries DESC
LIMIT 5
RETURN m.title AS movie, num_countries AS number_of_countries
error: Schema mismatch: person entity doesn't have country attribute

question: What are the first 5 movies with a release date on a weekend?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE date(m.release_date).dayOfWeek IN [5, 6, 7]
RETURN m.title, m.release_date
ORDER BY m.release_date
LIMIT 5
error: TypeQL limitation: No date component extraction functions (dayOfWeek, day, month, etc.) - cannot filter by day of week

question: Which 3 adult films have been released during a leap year?
cypher:
MATCH (a:Adult)
WHERE a.release_date IS NOT NULL AND
      date(a.release_date).year % 4 = 0 AND
      date(a.release_date).month = 2 AND
      date(a.release_date).day = 29
RETURN a.title
LIMIT 3
error: TypeQL limitation: No datetime component extraction functions (year, month, day). Cannot check for leap year (Feb 29) because TypeQL cannot extract date parts from datetime values for comparison.

question: Which 3 movies have the highest popularity and were released in the last 5 years?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE m.release_date >= date() - duration('P5Y')
RETURN m.title, m.popularity
ORDER BY m.popularity DESC
LIMIT 3
error: TypeQL limitation: No dynamic date functions. Cannot express date() - duration() for relative date calculations like last 5 years.

question: Which movies have been produced by companies based in 'France'?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)-[:PRODUCED_BY]->(c:ProductionCompany)-[:PRODUCED_IN_COUNTRY]->(country:Country {name: 'France'})
RETURN m.title
error: Schema mismatch: Cypher expects ProductionCompany->PRODUCED_IN_COUNTRY->Country relation, but TypeQL schema only has media->produced_in_country->country. No relation exists between production_company and country entities.

question: Which movies have a release date on a leap year?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE m.release_date IS NOT NULL AND date(m.release_date).year % 4 = 0
RETURN m.title, m.release_date
error: TypeQL limitation: Cannot extract year from datetime or perform modulo operations on date components. Leap year check (year % 4 == 0) requires date arithmetic functions not available in TypeQL.

question: List the first 3 actors with roles in both movies and videos.
cypher:
MATCH (p:Person)-[:CAST_FOR]->(m:Movie)
WHERE exists{ (p)-[:CAST_FOR]->(:Video) }
RETURN p.name
LIMIT 3
error: Schema mismatch: video entity does not have cast_for relationship in TypeQL schema. Videos only have crew_for, not cast_for. Cannot check for actors with roles in videos.

question: Name the top 5 movies with the most detailed overviews (measured by word count).
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE m.overview IS NOT NULL
RETURN m.title, m.overview, size(split(m.overview, ' ')) AS wordCount
ORDER BY wordCount DESC
LIMIT 5
error: TypeQL limitation: No string split() or size() functions available. Cannot count words in string.
